Summary: starlike,pulsating,like a lighthouse in the sky,moved up and down,various colors
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Bastrop
There were no other sightings in Bastrop on or around October 8th 2013
divs: sighting detailsi dont guess you are very interested in my reports. i asked you to follow up since this is my third report. there must be someone in the austin area you could put me in touch with to check these things out. there is one in the north east sky right now flashing and moving up and down. it is so very obvious.to say i am frustrated is putting it mildly. are you or are you not interested in ufo phenomenon? contact me and leave me a phone number and i will be happy to point these objects out to you. unless of coarse you know what they are and are bound by some kind of law to discredit sightings like these.sincerely [name removed\cms\tg].
